Text: Raven, what are \n you doing here?
You're always \n there when I \n need you.
Actually, I'm \n not feeling so \n hot today.
You ever have one of \n those days you wish you \n could get out of mining?
Hmph. Guess it wouldn't \n hurt for me to go out in \n your place.
You'd do that for me!? \n Thank you!
Bring back a big haul \n for us, okay?
I'm always up for action \n when you need a break.
